objects.text:
• POLYCARBONATE HARDSIDED
• 8 WHEEL TROLLEY DESIGN
• LIMITED EDITION COLOR
• LIGHTWEIGHT - ONLY 6.6 LBS

product_details.name: MOKOBARA The Em Cabin Polycarbonate Hardsided Luggage | 8 Wheel Trolley Bag | Travel Suitcase for Men & Women (4AM Forest Sunray (Limited Edition))…
product_details.description: Item Weight: 6.6 pounds. Body Material: Polycarbonate. Finish Type: Glossy. Product Dimensions: 21.65 x 12.99 x 8.82 inches. Country of Origin: China. Color Name: 4AM Forest Sunray (Limited Edition). Material Type: Polycarbonate (PC). Size: One Size.

banner_details:
This banner features a bold promotional layout for a limited-edition travel product. The design is split diagonally into four color-blocked quadrants, separated with a yellow divider line. The top-left section contains a large, white bold heading (`heading_1`) and a bright yellow subheading (`heading_2`), promoting a stylish travel theme. Beneath these, a smaller uppercase tagline (`subheading`) adds context. The lower-left quadrant includes a bullet list (`description`) of product features, followed by a large white price tag (`price`) and a dark rectangular call-to-action button (`cta_button`) with yellow text (`cta`). The right half includes a luggage mockup (`product_image`) and supporting text — a stock urgency tagline (`tagline`), brand name (`brand_name`) in yellow, and product variant (`product_variant`) below. The background incorporates grid lines and semi-transparent circles for abstract dynamism.

**Color Palette:**
- Black: #1A1A1A 
- Dark Gray: #333333 
- Light Gray: #E0E0E0 
- Yellow: #FFC107 
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image displays a sleek suitcase predominantly in deep forest green (#1F2A20), paired with a vibrant mustard yellow (#F2C100) zipper lining that adds a bold, contrasting edge. Black accents (#000000) are used on the handle and wheels, balancing functionality with aesthetics. The matte texture on the green surface seamlessly blends the base color, while the yellow serves as an eye-catching highlight that defines the suitcase's form and style. These colors establish a refined yet adventurous palette ideal for an advertisement banner—combining sophistication with a touch of vibrancy to capture attention while conveying reliability and modern design.
